text: The Zeiss Otus 1.4/55 is a manual focus standard prime lens for Canon Inc. and Nikon DSLR bodies. It was announced by Zeiss on October 7, 2013. It is noted for producing a sharp image, with good correction for chromatic and spherical aberration as well as distortion. It produces pleasant bokeh, but vignettes strongly on full frame bodies at its maximum aperture.http://www.lenstip.com/390.11-Lens_review- Carl_Zeiss_Otus_55_mm_f_1.4_ZE_ZF.2_Summary.html ==References== *http://www.dpreview.com/products/zeiss/lenses/zeiss_otus_55_1p4/specifications *http://www.zeiss.de/camera-lenses/de_de/camera_lenses/otus/otus1455.html Otus 55 Otus 55 Category:Camera lenses introduced in 2013
title: Zeiss Otus 1.4/55
